content: Shopping Lifestyle Asked by AnonymousAsked on 11 Jun 2019What is the minimum amount you need in your ShopBack account to withdraw all your cashback?5 answersAnswerBump0
Answers (5)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent
Seh Xiong ChongLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 18 Jun 2019$100 comments4

Junus EuTop Contributor (Sep)Level 8. WizardAnswered on 11 Jun 2019Here's the answer straight from the Shopback FAQs: https://support.shopback.sg/hc/en-us/articles/115010365548-How-do-I-request-for-a-payout-into-my-bank-account-
To cash out, you must meet the minimum Available Balance per withdrawal method of your choice, in your ShopBack account.For Bank, the minimum Available Balance must be SGD 10For Paypal, the minimum Available Balance must be SGD 100 comments3
Gabriel Tham, Kenichi Tag Team Member at Tag TeamLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 11 Jun 2019Minimum to withdraw is $100 comments1
